response.overview: A brand-new attraction is coming to Epcot ’94, it’s called Innoventionis and it focuses on all the new technology that’s just about to improve our lives, expand our horizons and fuel our imagination.  Arousing to then Walt Disney Chairman, president, and CEO, Michael Eisner.  Innoventions is a word that combines invention and innovation, which is now the new core of Walt Disney Worlds Epcot Center, designed to deal with the near future, what will happen in our lives, Tomorrow, next month, next year.  According to Marty Sklar, President of Walt Disney Imagineering, the project is a reflection of what Walt had in mind when he first started talking about Epcot.  From electric cars to video phones and the early days of Virtual Reality, it’s amazing to see where we are today, vs 1994.
response.title: Epcot Innoventions Behind the Scenes
